scripts.build: yarn workspace @encrejs/web run build && yarn workspace @encrejs/core run build
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @encrejs/web run lint && yarn workspace @encrejs/core run lint && yarn workspace @encrejs/api run lint
scripts.publish:core: bash ./release-branch.sh && turbo run --filter @encrejs/core build test --concurrency 1 && yarn workspace @encrejs/core run release
scripts.publish:api: bash ./release-branch.sh && turbo run --filter @encrejs/api build test --concurrency 1 && yarn workspace @encrejs/api run release
